thread.title: Caught on CCTV camera: Two Dera Sacha Sauda members brutally murdered in Punjab - WATCH
thread.title_full: Caught on CCTV camera: Two Dera Sacha Sauda members brutally murdered in Punjab - WATCH

title: Caught on CCTV camera: Two Dera Sacha Sauda members brutally murdered in Punjab - WATCH
text:
Khanna: A shocking incident of murder of Dera Sacha Sauda members has been caught on camera. 
In the video, two Dera Sacha Sauda members can be seen being gunned down by unidentified assailants. 
The crime took place in Punjab's Khanna on 25th Feb. Caught on CCTV: Two Dera Sacha Sauda members gunned down by unidentified assailants in Punjab's Khanna (25.2.2017). pic.twitter.com/y6nxF26zLy   10:36 More from zeenews
